title: Last Minute Close Combat Quest.
body:
Hey everyone,

My friend base is preoccupied with PUBG, I am hoping I can find people to actually do this quest with.

I have a large melee champion pool, if anyone would like to help a fella out and add me to help me, you, us get it, even if you have already completed the quest, I would appreciate it.

I don't care about the level of players, I might even have some random skin gifts floating around for the person who helps me get this quest.

I start work at 3pm tomorrow, will be on for several hours now and in the morning.

Thanks for your time, have a great weekend!

replies.body: Thank you all for your adds, I now have it completed. Thank you all
